mapper.insert: insert into check_task_assignment ( monthId, month, evaluatorId, evaluator, operationPostId, operationPost, description) value (#{monthId},#{month},#{evaluatorId},#{evaluator},#{operationPostId},#{operationPost},#{description})
mapper.select:
select
from check_task_assignment where 1 = 1
and monthId like '%${monthId}%'
and month like '%${month}%'
SELECT count(*) FROM check_task_assignment task WHERE task.monthId = #{monthId} AND task.operationPostId = #{operationPostId} AND task.`status` = 1
SELECT task.evaluator FROM check_task_assignment task WHERE task.monthId = #{monthId} AND task.operationPostId = #{operationPostId} AND task.`status` = 0
